title: Cloud control panel implementation on CA AppLogic platform
segmentation: Thank you and I want to use this presentation presentation too.
Tell you a little bit more about our software called Cloud Control Panel or the CCP Cloud Control Panel is an applaud Crescent application developed by unit.
It was specifically designed to bridge the gap between the end user experience on one side and the cloud platform on the other.
This is the leading control panel of the choice for the App Logic platform, so I'll just make an introduction.
And into the sea project platform solution.
It's a turnkey cloud platform where the hardware and software components are virtualized and accessible via catalog.
It has a unique GUI graphical user interface which is helpful for application designers.
It offers very popular automatic scaling features and an ability to quickly and easily replicate similar applications or instances of the applications.
One more advantage is that App Logic doesn't have to be installed on expensive hardware.
It can use low-cost servers and networking equipment.
So who's the CC P4?
Unit.
Is developing and researching app logic for three years is 2009.
In that time we had several different use cases of the different businesses interested in applying this solution.
First we had a couple of enterprise companies that were interested in using the CCP in-house.

To enhance the agility and flexibility of deploying the applications for their own Internet Internet business and then we have service providers who can offer who can control and meter their cloud services, cloud applications.
An enterprise class clouds.
And Lastly, as lots last one, we have software as a service vendors where they can use the CCP as a central management .4 for developing and deploying and managing their services.
The CCP is a complex mall.
The module and tired cent OS PHP, Apache, Oracle based application.
It acts as a middle layer between the cloud platform and its end users.
The end users can be administrators, customers, support agents and billing users.
It can be deployed as any other app logic application and one CCP instance can control any number of private clouds, no matter on the geographical location of the private cloud.
So this.

Pretty picture shows how the CCP application looks in the design mode in the App Logic Canvas you see that we have on the left hand side a catalog with a lot of components that can be pulled out, put on canvas, then connected with virtual connnectors.
It simplifies the design process for the application designer and then when we're ready we can say that the application can be declared too.
Become the user template from the templates.
The customer can provision an create its own instance.
So the key software feature.
As of the CCP are the enhancement of the service design and management capabilities of the cloud platform itself.
And user control and ordering automation, I can say that these two items were significant in lowering the impact on the strain on the L1 and L2 support within our business.
It can meet are the resources that the applications are using, CPU, RAM and disk space.
We offer the full APR for integration with any external billing system, for example that you so you can use or export metering resources and charge your customers based on those.
And you can even customize the CCP.
You would probably want to have it Re branded an even translate it to your own language.

This is an example of the order form created using the SCPS API for the company DNS Europe.
They had their own specific requirements in offering their own templates.
They want to have the grouping by operating system, then the server type and then by some other options.
We need each of those choices choices is clicked.
It's translated actually into the one specific template from which the application will be provisioned.
Some other company had.
Different requirements they wanted to have first grouping by geographical locations, then the data center and then the template.

The customer then fills in the standard web registration form and is transferred to the Secure Payment page.
And the pond is successful.

User point of view.
End user CCP offers a lot of options to the customer that are not available.
Because he does on share cloud because he doesn't have the root access to the cloud itself.
He can see the list of the applications that he owns.
He's not concerned by the location of the application or the private cloud where the application is deployed.
He can change the resources.
He can resize volumes.
Change settings even delete the application and he has insight into the past history consumption of the resources to track the billing data.
I want to show you.
The settings page in order to explain the real power behind the CCP called metadata feature.
Each app Logic template has a set of properties.
When the application designer is creating the application, he decides what the properties will be.
Each application has different properties.
These properties are usually with the user unfriendly names and robot output is unreadable to the end user.
By applying metadata is the middle layer on top of the row output from the private cloud private cloud platform.
You can offer more comfort and customization to the end user.
Say you have a primary IP that.
First you give him a pretty name like.
Some label and then you wish to have the primary IP as locked property that cannot be changed by end user.
Because if he changes the IP address, it will probably disrupt the working of the application.
You can use the metadata to define and decide how the property will behave.
It can be changeable, it can be hidden, it can be unchangeable by the end users.
You can define that it can be it.
Initial value will be pulled out from the IP pool and assigned when the application is created.
So the application is available at the moment of its creation.
You can then take a look at the primary and the secondary DNS.
These initial values are pulled out from a constant, but we can allow the end user to change them becausw he can use whatever DNS he or she wishes to do.
Some same goes for root passwords.
Using metadata you can define that the password will be initially created from a random string.
And then when the application is created, you can allow the end user to change it through the control panel.
Next page is about.
Changing the resources, it shows the application that is complex.
It has more than one components here.
Some components are hidden because we don't wish to allow the customer to change it.
Some are locked and some are available for modification.
Minimum maximum values slider step are all controllable from the admin CCP.
There is no.

There is even an option to define the formula that defines the dependency between the CPU and the RAM memory, because you would typically wish to prohibit the users to order 8 core CPUs and only used to fund 256 milligrams and thus.
Take up all of the server, but you have a lot of memory, then unused.

You can save and rest of the component or save and restore the application and even schedule the job execution in the future you would get the pop up where you can select the time where it's more appropriate for replication to restart when the load is minimum on it.
So.
This was a brief run through from the end users perspective.
Add Mississippi has a lot of features that enable the cloud service designer to define cloud cloud service is presented to the end user.
It can control how the application is ordered, how its diploid configured, managed and metered, and it can do so automatically.
System management is extensively.
Researched and done in the ad Mississippi.
You can manage orders, you can manage user accounts by assigning user to various roles.
You can then assign users to groups and assign templates to groups so that only certain group users can order certain templates.
That was mainly the requirement from the enterprise companies who wished to assign certain templates to one Department and the other templates to the other Department.
You can change emails and parameters that are that are depicted on the end user side.
You have a job monitoring console where you can see and troubleshoot by looking into extensive job execution, lock weather problems with certain applications.
It has some.
Network objects like like I peoples, villain pools and subnets that are transferred to its counterparts on a network level.
If the application requires it so.

So if you have a template that needs to be provisioned with a different wheel on each time with the application is created, you would assign to that property villain ID from AV line pool and when the application is created the V line D is automatic automatically assigned to the application from the first available choice.
You know we're on pool.
Another useful feature is embedded in sternal contact.
Cause all of this is about integration with external external software that if company is using.
Let's say you have an arc Backup server template.
It would typically have an external sound storage part on this sun storage is not controlled by a private cloud or control biology product platform.

You can write a custom script that will communicate with the stand storage, pull out the necessary data from the storage, and by using snippets you can embed that content in the to the appropriate place Holder.
In the end user CCP.
And with this gift to the customer.
Value added service and more information in their control panel.
So this is the view.
All of the ad Mississippi, as you can see, it's much more elaborate than the end users control panel.
And this is the private cloud section where you can manage different private clouds.
As you can see, these are the DCP manages 2 private clouds in different datacenters.
They even have a different app logic versions installed, so I'm not going to launch into the lengthy explanation of each of these options as much as they like to.
And I would just say that I'm available for a live demonstration.
If anyone is interested later on.
And at the end I want to mention the product.
That was created with CAE Boston Company in Supermicro.
It's called the meal at Logic Micro unit.
It's a 2 unit rack mountable server created by Supermicro with preinstalled app Logic platform.
It was developed specifically with mine in mind with to the independent software developers.
If you're independent software developer which is ready to go into the business and to the broader market, you can have already made solution with the private cloud.
CCP installed even some templates just to get you started, and within the 24 hours it's basically Cloud Inbox.
It's an unpopular term.
Unit is offering training, education and support for every app logic, customer and as well as App Logic Micro unit customers.
So thank you very much for your attention.
